attributes.action: Restrict the amount of HGV vehicles on British Road by reverting to frieght train use as this will reduce congestion on the motorways(and accidents) and will ultimatly help fight against global warming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition aims to bring back the use of trains as transport for our goods. British roads are almost at a standstill and a lot of this is caused by large HGV vehicles clogging up our roads and motorways also creating far far more harmfull gasses than any train. Not only that a frieght train carries far more than 10 or even 20 trucks do (is that not a saving of congestion and green house gasses)If we want to save the enviroment lets do something positive get rid of these lorries now.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/vehicle-mania/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
